data.text:
Forging business alliances Working with diverse partners inspires new ideas and approaches, fostering innovation and growth within the business community. Business alliances drive economic development by attracting new businesses, encouraging investment, and stimulating local economic activity. A united front through alliances amplifies policy advocacy, economic development, or community initiatives. These alliances result into to shared resources, such as marketing platforms, networking events, capacity expertise, and increasing efficiency. Happy Friday and Enjoy your weekend. #businesspartnerships #lcci

LCCI signs an MoU with AeTrade Group.. To jointly promote Sokokuu.Africa platform, which connects buyers and sellers, facilitates the movement of goods between buyers and sellers, provides e-payment from buyers to sellers, which enables compliance and regulations with customs and revenue authorities and other Government Departments. Sokokuu.Africa sets in collaboration with the LCCI to onboard enterprises to trade and transact on the sokokuu. Africa platform. "Through this initiative, SMEs will gain enhanced access to financing and markets, fostering their growth and boosting their role in Africa's socio-economic development." #SMEgrowth #SMEdevelopment

Moving a step closer towards cross-border trade How fulfilling is it to serve as an advocacy body and the voice of business, entrusted with the core responsibility of fostering a conducive environment and facilitating B2B networking and matchmaking, all with the aim of promoting the interests of our members? Facilitated by the Embassy of Lesotho in China, Mr. John Talla, LCCI, and CCCI conducted a webinar meeting with the purpose of fostering closer ties and trade collaborations, especially focusing on intra-trade import and export. #LCCI #CCCI #INVESTMENTPROMOTION

Here at LCCI, we celebrate and empower women in business. We encourage them to lead and shine in their designated roles. Our distinguished women, with their wealth of knowledge and proven track records, proudly represent us at the country's prestigious meetings. They serve on stakeholder boards, shaping their tenacity and contributing to our collective success. Together, we foster an environment where their talents flourish and aspirations thrive. üíº‚ú® #WomenInBusiness #Empowerment #Leadership"

Promotion and Facilitation Dialogue between the Government of Lesotho and her Development Partners. LCCI with its esteemed anchors in different clusters of business graced an invitation to the Technical Level Aid Coordination Forum. With motive to promote mutual accountability between the Government of Lesotho and her Development Partners, the Aid Coordination Structure in presence of the Private Sector and other relevant Stakeholders laid out its intent to foster a Divergent and an Enabling Environment for the Private Sector to thrive. #MinistryofFinance #UNDP #Europeanunion #LCCI

Digital Marketing and Social Media Marketing Workshop Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) are the primary economic drivers in our country. Therefore, as providers of business development services, it is incumbent upon us to equip them with essential industry tools to fuel their success. #digitalmarketing #socialmediamakerking #lcci

Inspirational Monday Saluting trailblazers whose passion and leadership elevate our standards and inspiring generations to come. We proudly acknowledge the pivotal role in advancing Lesotho‚Äôs global Presence, epitomizing excellence at international trade fairs. You redefine success, shape a brighter future and we honor your dedication; transforms challenges into opportunities, enriching our business landscape. #lcci #growingabetterLesotho

Blissful Weekend Weekends are the perfect time to recharge your batteries and connect with those who matter most. Wishing you a weekend filled with happiness, relaxation, and renewed focus! #lcci #lcciGalaDinner

Queen Mother We express our sincere gratitude for the esteemed Queen Mother's steadfast commitment to addressing the socio-economic challenges that impact our nation. Her dedication and tireless efforts in striving to foster a better future for all vulnerable Basotho citizens is truly commendable. Furthermore, we extend our heartfelt appreciation to the national stakeholders whose unwavering support and genuine collaboration contribute significantly to the realization of these vital societal objectives. #hermajesty #herexecellency
